WITH RECURSIVE comment_tree AS ( SELECT c.comment_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.board_id, u.nickname, c.comment_contents AS contents, c.comment_created_at AS createdAt, c.comment_modified_at AS modifiedAt, 0 AS depth FROM comment c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} AND c.parent_comment_id IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT c.comment_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.board_id, u.nickname, c.comment_contents, c.comment_created_at, c.comment_modified_at, ct.depth + 1 FROM comment c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN comment_tree ct ON c.parent_comment_id = ct.comment_id ) SELECT * FROM comment_tree ORDER BY createdAt ASC

SELECT b.board_title AS boardTitle, c.comment_contents AS contents, c.comment_created_at AS createdAt, c.comment_modified_at AS modifiedAt FROM comment c JOIN board b ON c.board_id = b.board_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.comment_created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
